content: Exciting things are happening at Stanford Court! We just completed a 16 million dollar makeover. We upgraded and re-worked our Common Lobby, Bar, & Fitness Center. Enjoy our new arrival experience with floor to ceiling windows and lots of fun elements inspired by the cityâ€™s past, present and future. We partnered with EDG design to create an egdy, but inviting design with a happy blend of comfort, classic and cool. Be among the first to rediscover the new Stanford Court.
